author: aaron
msg: Fix to allow VPATH builds. The export lists are created in the build dirs.
The Beos fix is untested, so please verify.

author: stoddard
msg: Add expat license terms. Greg must have missed this file when he first
downloaded the expat source from anoncvs.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Add DB4 detection.  It is identical to DB3 for all of our current purposes.
Also, clean up the autoconf DB macros to be name-space protected and

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Clean up some of the preprocessor conditionals.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: - Improve the output of testdbm so that morons like me have a shot of
understanding how to run this program.
- Add "auto" command which does some simple store and fetches so that
we can test the sanity of the program without having input files handy.
